policy_name: Star Cancer Care Platinum Insurance Policy
co_payment: 10% of each and every claim amount for fresh as well as renewal policies for insured persons whose age at the time of entry is 61 years and above
medical_records_for_uw: Previous medical records including details of treatment to be submitted along with proposal

lumpsum_cover_section_2.variability: This lumpsum sum insured cannot vary
lumpsum_cover_section_2.payable_when: Insured person suffers a recurrence, metastasis, and / or a second malignancy unrelated to first cancer
lumpsum_cover_section_2.benefit_addition: This benefit is addition to the sum insured of Indemnity cover under Section I
lumpsum_cover_section_2.claim_impact: Claim for lump-sum, the coverage under Section II ceases and the policy will continue with Section I

indemnity_cover_section_1.pre_post_hospitalization: Pre hospitalization 30 days & Post hospitalization 60 days (up to 2% of the basic sum insured per hospitalization)
indemnity_cover_section_1.day_care_procedures: All day care procedures are covered (Actuals)
indemnity_cover_section_1.health_check_up: Upto Rs 2,500 for every claim free year
indemnity_cover_section_1.medical_second_opinion: Available mail to e_medicalopinion@starhealth.in or through post/courier
indemnity_cover_section_1.modern_treatments: Covered upto the Sub-limits mentioned in the policy clause
indemnity_cover_section_1.rehabilitation_and_pain_management: Covered upto the Sub-limits (or) up to 10% of the Sum Insured whichever is less, per policy year. Rehabilitation includes Poly Trauma, Head injury, Disease of spine, Stroke
wellness_service: Specialist Consultation available through Star Telehealth app
indemnity_cover_section_1.hospice_care: Payable upto 20% of sum insured at network providers on indemnity basis, payable once in life time. Waiting Period: 12 Months
indemnity_cover_section_1.no_claim_bonus: 5% of basic sum insured for each claim free year subject to a maximum of 50%

waiting_period.initial_waiting_period: 30 days for all illness (Except for accidents)
